Environment = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
if 'prod' in Environment:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
else:
    StorageAccount = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountRead = 'citylogisticsstorageprod'
    StorageAccountRead2 = 'citylogisticsstorage'
    StorageAccountWrite = 'citylogisticsstorage'

# ' + StorageAccount + '
from pyspark.sql import functions as F

#Create DataFrame for the v2customerorder LMSV2 Table
v2customerorder = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2customerorder.parquet', format='parquet')
columns=v2customerorder.columns
for i in range(len(columns)):v2customerorder=v2customerorder.withColumnRenamed(columns[i],'v2'+ columns[i])
v2customerorder.createOrReplaceTempView("v2customerorder")

#Create DataFrame for the v2deliverynote LMSV2 Table
v2deliverynote = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2deliverynote.parquet', format='parquet')
columns1=v2deliverynote.columns
for i in range(len(columns1)):v2deliverynote=v2deliverynote.withColumnRenamed(columns1[i],'v2'+ columns1[i])
v2deliverynote.createOrReplaceTempView("v2deliverynote")

#Create DataFrame for the v2manifest LMSV2 Table
v2manifest = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2manifest.parquet', format='parquet')
columns2=v2manifest.columns
for i in range(len(columns2)):v2manifest=v2manifest.withColumnRenamed(columns2[i],'v2'+ columns2[i])
v2manifest.createOrReplaceTempView("v2manifest")

#Create DataFrame for the v2consignment LMSV2 Table
v2consignment = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2consignment.parquet', format='parquet')
columns3=v2consignment.columns
for i in range(len(columns3)):v2consignment=v2consignment.withColumnRenamed(columns3[i],'v2'+ columns3[i])
v2consignment.createOrReplaceTempView("v2consignment")

#Create DataFrame for the v2parcel LMSV2 Table
v2parcel = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2parcel.parquet', format='parquet')
columns8=v2parcel.columns
for i in range(len(columns8)):v2parcel=v2parcel.withColumnRenamed(columns8[i],'v2'+ columns8[i])
v2parcel.createOrReplaceTempView("v2parcel")

#Create DataFrame for the v2track LMSV2 Table
v2track = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2track.parquet', format='parquet')
columns9=v2track.columns
for i in range(len(columns9)):v2track=v2track.withColumnRenamed(columns9[i],'v2'+ columns9[i])
v2track.createOrReplaceTempView("v2track")

#Create DataFrame for the v2movement LMSV2 Table
v2movement = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2movement.parquet', format='parquet')
columns10=v2movement.columns
for i in range(len(columns10)):v2movement=v2movement.withColumnRenamed(columns10[i],'v2'+ columns10[i])
v2movement.createOrReplaceTempView("v2movement")

#Create DataFrame for the mdcustomer LMSV2 Table
mdcustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/dbocustomer.parquet', format='parquet')
columns13=mdcustomer.columns
for i in range(len(columns13)):mdcustomer=mdcustomer.withColumnRenamed(columns13[i],'v2'+ columns13[i])
mdcustomer.createOrReplaceTempView("mdcustomer")

#Create DataFrame for the mddeliverycustomer LMSV2 Table
mddeliverycustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/dbodeliverycustomer.parquet', format='parquet')
columns14=mddeliverycustomer.columns
for i in range(len(columns14)):mddeliverycustomer=mddeliverycustomer.withColumnRenamed(columns14[i],'v2'+ columns14[i])
mddeliverycustomer.createOrReplaceTempView("mddeliverycustomer")

#Create DataFrame for the v2deliverynoteparcel LMSV2 Table
v2deliverynoteparcel = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2deliverynoteparcel.parquet', format='parquet')
columns15=v2deliverynoteparcel.columns
for i in range(len(columns15)):v2deliverynoteparcel=v2deliverynoteparcel.withColumnRenamed(columns15[i],'v2dnp'+ columns15[i])
v2deliverynoteparcel.createOrReplaceTempView("v2deliverynoteparcel")

#Create DataFrame for the v2consignmentperparcel LMSV2 Table
v2consignmentperparcel = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2consignmentperparcel.parquet', format='parquet')
columns16=v2consignmentperparcel.columns
for i in range(len(columns16)):v2consignmentperparcel=v2consignmentperparcel.withColumnRenamed(columns16[i],'v2'+ columns16[i])
v2consignmentperparcel.createOrReplaceTempView("v2consignmentperparcel")

#Create DataFrame for the v2parcelmessage LMSV2 Table
v2parcelmessage = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2parcelmessage.parquet', format='parquet')
columns17=v2parcelmessage.columns
for i in range(len(columns17)):v2parcelmessage=v2parcelmessage.withColumnRenamed(columns17[i],'v2'+ columns17[i])
v2parcelmessage.createOrReplaceTempView("v2parcelmessage")

#Create DataFrame for the v2debriefdata LMSV2 Table
v2debriefdata = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2debriefdata.parquet', format='parquet')
columns18=v2debriefdata.columns
for i in range(len(columns18)):v2debriefdata=v2debriefdata.withColumnRenamed(columns18[i],'v2ddata'+ columns18[i])
v2debriefdata.createOrReplaceTempView("v2debriefdata")

#Create DataFrame for the v2debriefdocument LMSV2 Table
v2debriefdocument = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2debriefdocument.parquet', format='parquet')
columns19=v2debriefdocument.columns
for i in range(len(columns19)):v2debriefdocument=v2debriefdocument.withColumnRenamed(columns19[i],'v2ddoc'+ columns19[i])
v2debriefdocument.createOrReplaceTempView("v2debriefdocument")

#Create DataFrame for the v2parceldetail LMSV2 Table
v2parceldetail = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/CLMasterData/v2parceldetail.parquet', format='parquet')
columns20=v2parceldetail.columns
for i in range(len(columns20)):v2parceldetail=v2parceldetail.withColumnRenamed(columns20[i],'v2'+ columns20[i])
v2parceldetail.createOrReplaceTempView("v2parceldetail")

######################################################################################################

#Create DataFrame for the dbowaybill LMS Table
dbowaybill = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbowaybill.parquet', format='parquet')
columns4=dbowaybill.columns
for i in range(len(columns4)):dbowaybill=dbowaybill.withColumnRenamed(columns4[i],'v1'+ columns4[i])
dbowaybill.createOrReplaceTempView("dbowaybill")

#Create DataFrame for the dboloads LMS Table
dboloads = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboloads.parquet', format='parquet')
columns5=dboloads.columns
for i in range(len(columns5)):dboloads=dboloads.withColumnRenamed(columns5[i],'v1'+ columns5[i])
dboloads.createOrReplaceTempView("dboloads")

#Create DataFrame for the dboconsignment LMS Table
dboconsignment = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboconsignment.parquet', format='parquet')
columns6=dboconsignment.columns
for i in range(len(columns6)):dboconsignment=dboconsignment.withColumnRenamed(columns6[i],'v1'+ columns6[i])
dboconsignment.createOrReplaceTempView("dboconsignment")

#Create DataFrame for the dboorder LMS Table
dboorder = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboorder.parquet', format='parquet')
columns7=dboorder.columns
for i in range(len(columns7)):dboorder=dboorder.withColumnRenamed(columns7[i],'v1'+ columns7[i])
dboorder.createOrReplaceTempView("dboorder")

# Create DataFrame for the sstparcelunion LMS Table
sstparcelunion = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/sstparcelunion.parquet', format='parquet')
columns11=sstparcelunion.columns
for i in range(len(columns11)):sstparcelunion=sstparcelunion.withColumnRenamed(columns11[i],'v1'+ columns11[i])
sstparcelunion.createOrReplaceTempView("sstparcelunion")

# Create DataFrame for the ssttrackunion LMS Table
ssttrackunion = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Semi Structured Data/OPS/ssttrackunion.parquet', format='parquet')
columns12=ssttrackunion.columns
for i in range(len(columns12)):ssttrackunion=ssttrackunion.withColumnRenamed(columns12[i],'v1'+ columns12[i])
ssttrackunion.createOrReplaceTempView("ssttrackunion")

# Create DataFrame for the dbocustomer LMS Table
dbocustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbocustomer.parquet', format='parquet')
columns21=dbocustomer.columns
for i in range(len(columns21)):dbocustomer=dbocustomer.withColumnRenamed(columns21[i],'v1'+ columns21[i])
dbocustomer.createOrReplaceTempView("dbocustomer")

# Create DataFrame for the dbowaybillsperparcel LMS Table
dbowaybillsperparcel = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbowaybillsperparcel.parquet', format='parquet')
columns22=dbowaybillsperparcel.columns
for i in range(len(columns22)):dbowaybillsperparcel=dbowaybillsperparcel.withColumnRenamed(columns22[i],'v1'+ columns22[i])
dbowaybillsperparcel.createOrReplaceTempView("dbowaybillsperparcel")

# Create DataFrame for the dboparcelmessage LMS Table
dboparcelmessage = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dbocsd_messageparcel.parquet', format='parquet')
columns23=dboparcelmessage.columns
for i in range(len(columns23)):dboparcelmessage=dboparcelmessage.withColumnRenamed(columns23[i],'v1'+ columns23[i])
dboparcelmessage.createOrReplaceTempView("dboparcelmessage")

# Create DataFrame for the dboparceldetail LMS Table
dboparceldetail = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/LMS/dboparceldetail.parquet', format='parquet')
columns24=dboparceldetail.columns
for i in range(len(columns24)):dboparceldetail=dboparceldetail.withColumnRenamed(columns24[i],'v1'+ columns24[i])
dboparceldetail.createOrReplaceTempView("dboparceldetail")

# Create DataFrame for the stlmstrack LMS Table
stlmstrack = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/stlmstrack.parquet', format='parquet')
columns25=stlmstrack.columns
for i in range(len(columns25)):stlmstrack=stlmstrack.withColumnRenamed(columns25[i],'v1'+ columns25[i])
stlmstrack.createOrReplaceTempView("stlmstrack")

reconparcel.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/LMSV2/reconparcel.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
reconwaybill.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/LMSV2/reconwaybill.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
reconorder.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/LMSV2/reconorder.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
reconconsignment.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/LMSV2/reconconsignment.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
reconloads.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/LMSV2/reconloads.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
recontrack.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/LMSV2/recontrack.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
reconmovement.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/LMSV2/reconmovement.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
reconparcelmessage.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/LMSV2/reconparcelmessage.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
reconparceldetail.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/LMSV2/reconparceldetail.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
reconconsignmentperparcel.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/LMSV2/reconconsignmentperparcel.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
recondeliverynoteparcel.write.parquet('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountWrite + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/LMSV2/recondeliverynoteparcel.parquet', mode = "overwrite")
